response:
Hey love! So, I've been thinking about my career and what I want for our future together. I've been doing some research on different industries and job opportunities, and I'm really interested in pursuing a career in management. I know it can be a challenging field, but I think I have the skills and determination to succeed.

As for salary, I know that managers typically earn a professional salary, so I'm hoping that we can work together to create a budget that will allow us to live comfortably and support our family. Of course, I also want to make sure that I have the opportunity to advance my career and take on new challenges as I gain more experience.

In terms of office culture, I've heard that some corporations can be quite demanding, but I'm hoping that we can find a company that values work-life balance and supports the growth of its employees. I know that you have a lot of experience in the business world, so I would love to hear your thoughts on this!

Overall, I'm really excited about the possibilities for our future together, and I can't wait to see where this journey takes us. What do you think, my love?

He's always been so dedicated to his work and has such a strong sense of integrity.

Now, let's talk about salaries. I think we both deserve a good amount of money to support our families and live comfortably. Maybe we can aim for a combined income of at least $200,000 per year? And as for the office, I think we should look for something modern and spacious, with plenty of natural light and comfortable seating. Maybe we can even have a view of the city skyline!

And finally, let's talk about our wedding. I want it to be a beautiful and intimate ceremony, with all of our closest friends and family in attendance.
